Uses of Class
com.igormaznitsa.prol.logic.ProlContext

Packages that use ProlContext
com.igormaznitsa.prol.containers The package contains special containers which are used by the engine. 
com.igormaznitsa.prol.easygui The package contains a small GUI editor allows to edit prol scripts and start them. 
com.igormaznitsa.prol.io The package contains classes to work with input-output streams from the engine. 
com.igormaznitsa.prol.libraries The package contains prolog library related classes, the prol core library is placed in the package. 
com.igormaznitsa.prol.logic The package contains classes which are used to process goals and logic of the engine. 
com.igormaznitsa.prol.logic.triggers   
com.igormaznitsa.prol.parser The package contains classes which allows to read and parse sources and make a term tree from them. 
com.igormaznitsa.prol.utils The package contains auxuliary classes.
